user.title: Cover Time Based Sync
user.description: Initial configuration of the time-based cover.

data_description.travelling_time_up: Number of seconds it takes for the gate to fully open (0 → 100%).
data_description.travelling_time_down: Number of seconds it takes for the gate to fully close (100 → 0%).
data_description.open_script_entity_id: Script that starts opening the gate.
data_description.close_script_entity_id: Script that starts closing the gate.
data_description.stop_script_entity_id: Script that sends the stop command to the gate.
data_description.send_stop_at_ends: If enabled, also sends a stop command when reaching 0% or 100%.
data_description.always_confident: If enabled, assumes the calculated position is always correct, even without sensors.
data_description.smart_stop_midrange: If enabled, when setting a position between 20% and 80% it automatically sends the stop command when that position is reached.

init.title: Cover Time Based Sync options
init.description: Adjust timings and scripts for this cover.

data_description.travelling_time_up: Number of seconds until the gate fully opens.
data_description.travelling_time_down: Number of seconds until the gate fully closes.
data_description.open_script_entity_id: Script that will be called to start opening.
data_description.close_script_entity_id: Script that will be called to start closing.
data_description.stop_script_entity_id: Script that will be called to stop the movement.
data_description.send_stop_at_ends: If enabled, a stop command is sent when the gate reaches the end of travel (0% or 100%).
data_description.always_confident: If enabled, the position estimated from travel time is always considered correct.
data_description.aliases: List of alternative names for this cover (comma-separated, optional).
data_description.smart_stop_midrange: If enabled, when setting a position between 20% and 80% the integration automatically sends the stop command when that position is reached.
